p: Synthetic DNAs for the following viruses were synthesised (Sigma, Castle Hill, Australia) to determine the specificity and sensitivity of the individual PCR component of the assays. Flaviviruses; DENV-1, DENV-2, DENV-3, DENV-4, WNV, ZIKV, YFV, TBEV and MVEV. Aphaviruses; CHIKV, BFV, RRV, Eastern equine encephalitis virus (EEEV), Western equine encephalitis virus (WEEV), Venezuelan equine encephalitis virus (VEEV), Middleburg virus (MV) and Ndumu virus (NV).
